text: @10DowningStreet @DehennaDavison @BorisJohnson Can you tell me why your government are not supplying the NHS with ffp3 masks/non direct ventilated goggles?. The current surgical masks will not protect against covid19 particles at 0.1 to 0.3 micron. I am starting class legal action and I would appreciate a response. Thanks
